REMINDER.description: Just a reminder that you're an Idiot

COMMENTS.comment: you can have on the time, day, dayOfWeek and month, add more than one variable
COMMENTS.ex to the comment 1: 'time': '6:00pm, 19:00' <- this will send notifications at 6pm and 7pm
COMMENTS.ex to the comment 2: 'dayOfWeek': '1, 3, 5' <- this will send notifications on mondays, wednesdays and fridays
COMMENTS.title: [ str ] The notification title (if it doesn't have it, it will be the task name)
COMMENTS.time: [ 24-hour format or 12-hour format  (DEFAULT: 6pm) ] Time of the notification
COMMENTS.dayOfWeek: [ 0 - 7 (0 or 7 is Sun, can also be 'weekends' or 'business days') ( DEFAULT: every day ) ] Day of the week of the notification
COMMENTS.timer: [ float (min) ; float:float (min:sec) ( DEFAULT: none ) ] A timer (at the end it sends a notification)
COMMENTS.withSound: [ true ; false ( DEFAULT: true ) ] Plays the default sound when the notification appears
